typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		posid as integer '000',
		itemid as integer '000',
		trandate as timestamp 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
		price as decimal(10,0) '$#########.###'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourcefile',
	partitionRootPath: 'raw/pos',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['raw/pos/**/*.txt']) ~> source1
